thread.title: Dev Patel has a girlfriend and everyone feels personally victimised
thread.title_full: Dev Patel has a girlfriend and everyone feels personally victimised

author: Jerico Mandybur
title: Dev Patel has a girlfriend and everyone feels personally victimised
text:
Hands up: Who feels personally victimised by Dev Patel's new girlfriend? If your hand isn't raised, you're a liar and a fraud.
While Australian actress Tilda Cobham-Hervey seems really cool and nice, the fact remains â€” she has burst our collective bubble by dating the internet's fantasy boyfriend, Lion actor (who does a mean Australian accent ) and known Longbottomer , Dev Patel. Why cruel fate?!
SEE ALSO: Dev Patel brought his mom to the Oscars and the internet can't get over them
The dreamboat and his Hotel Mumbai co-star/lover were snapped in L.A. Tuesday, with Patel's adorable mother also in tow.
this is dev patel's girlfriend. posting without comment. ðŸ™ƒðŸ™ƒðŸ™ƒ pic.twitter.com/lxRjnQ2oCO
â€” Zeba Blay (@zblay) March 1, 2017
Look how happy they are. Pfft, it won't last. Jokes! Good for them, etc. But the fact remains â€” the people are devastated.
Good evening to everyone except Dev Patel's new girlfriend. RT if you agree that I'd look cuter holding hands with Dev. pic.twitter.com/KQp1mej4WH
â€” Sandy (@sndy_snchz) March 1, 2017
I was not emotionally ready for Dev Patel to have a girlfriend.
â€” Hanna Flint (@HannaFlint) March 1, 2017
"dev patel has a girlfriend"
me: pic.twitter.com/rQd6RoUmkn
â€” letÃ­cia (@lsmiserables) March 1, 2017
dev patel has a girlfriend and i feel like i've been dumped
â€” ðŸ¥€ paola ðŸ¥€ (@5scsofpizza) March 1, 2017
The rumors aren't true, that white girl isn't Dev Patel's girlfriend. I am his girlfriend okay this is all fake news!
â€” Z. (@lujuriamiu) March 1, 2017
Dev Patel has a girlfriend and honestly I feel like my middle school crush just ripped the note I passed him into a thousand pieces
â€” Kayla JÃ©anne (@ohkayyyla2) March 1, 2017
saw an article about Dev Patel having a girlfriend and I made a conscious choice to not open it #selfcare
â€” Hannah Hodges (@hannah_nelle) March 1, 2017
The heartbreak is real. But some inexplicably mature people are beyond social media's pettiness.
Gonna block anyone that tweets about Dev Patel's girlfriend because I will not stand for this kind of negativity on my TL.
â€” Mallory Harris (@malgal_12) March 1, 2017
Ok I'm in love with him and his girlfriend ðŸ˜©ðŸ’œ #DevPatel pic.twitter.com/v8XjxbrDJQ
â€” ðŸ–¤ (@Tashousha) March 1, 2017
Dev has a history of dating mega babes. He previously dated his Slumdog Millionaire co-star Freida Pinto from 2008 to 2014. They too were heartbreakingly cute together. God dammit.
dev patel is dating someone that isn't freida pinto pic.twitter.com/sttAQGa6PZ
â€” paulina // 32 (@xpaubynature) March 1, 2017
old but gold ðŸ’•ðŸ’« #devpatel #freidapinto pic.twitter.com/dPi9rxqQ3U
â€” Hatice (@tanrisevsinslay) February 17, 2017
BONUS: There's a very good reason stars wore blue ribbons at the Oscars
